00057 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Controller_Listing extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractController {
00058         
00065         protected $componentManager;
00066         
00073         protected $configuration;
00074         
00081         protected $templateFile;
00082         
00083         //not used
00084         protected $piVars;
00085         
00094         public function __construct(F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager $componentManager, F3_MailformPlusPlus_Configuration $configuration) {
00095                 $this->componentManager = $componentManager;
00096                 $this->configuration = $configuration;
00097                 $this->initializeController();
00098         }
00099         
00107         public function setTemplateFile($template) {
00108                 $this->templateFile = $template;
00109         }
00110         
00117         public function process() {
00118                 $this->gp = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00119                 
00120                 //read settings
00121                 $settings = $this->configuration->getSettings();
00122                 if(!$settings['fe_listing.']) {
00123                         throw new Exception("No config found!");
00124                 }
00125                 $settings = $settings['fe_listing.'];
00126                 
00127                 //read table
00128                 $table = $settings['table'];
00129                 
00130                 if($this->gp['deleteId']) {
00131                         $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_DELETEquery($table,"uid=".$this->gp['deleteId']);    
00132                 }
00133                 
00134                 //set pid field
00135                 $pidField = "pid";
00136                 if($settings['pidField']) {
00137                         $pidField = $settings['pidField'];
00138                 }
00139                 $pids = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$settings['pid']);
00140                 
00141                 //parse mapping
00142                 $this->getMapping($settings);
00143                 
00144                 //set template file
00145                 $templateFile = $settings['templateFile'];
00146                 if(isset($settings['templateFile.']) && is_array($settings['templateFile.'])) {
00147                         $this->templateFile = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings['templateFile'],$settings['templateFile.']);
00148                 } else {
00149                         $this->templateFile = t3lib_div::getURL(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolvePath($templateFile));
00150                 }
00151                 
00152                 if(!$table || !$this->mapping) {
00153                         throw new Exception("Config insufficient!");
00154                 }
00155                 
00156                 //set view
00157                 $viewClass = $settings['view'];
00158                 if(!$viewClass) {
00159                         $viewClass = "F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Listing";
00160                 }
00161                 
00162                 
00163                 $view = $this->componentManager->getComponent($viewClass);
00164                 
00165                 if($this->gp['detailId']) {
00166                         $view->setTemplate($this->templateFile, 'DETAIL');
00167                 } else {
00168                         $view->setTemplate($this->templateFile, 'LIST');
00169                 }
00170                 
00171                 
00172                 //build WHERE clause
00173                 if($pids) {
00174                         $where = $pidField." IN (".implode(",",$pids).")";
00175                 }
00176                 
00177                 //set ORDER BY
00178                 $orderby = $settings['orderby'];
00179                 
00180                 //Select records
00181                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery("uid,".implode(",",array_keys($this->mapping)),$table,$where,'',$orderby);
00182                 
00183                 //buid items array
00184                 $listItems = array();
00185                 if($res && $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_num_rows($res) > 0) {
00186                         while($row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res)) {
00187                                 if(!$this->gp['detailId']) {
00188                                         array_push($listItems,$row);
00189                                 } elseif($row['uid'] == $this->gp['detailId']) {
00190                                         array_push($listItems,$row);
00191                                 }
00192                         }
00193                 }
00194                 
00195                 $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_free_result($res);
00196                 
00197                 //render view
00198                 $view->setModel($listItems);
00199                 return $view->render(array(),array());
00200                 
00201                 
00202         }
00203         
00211         protected function getMapping(&$settings) {
00212                 if(!is_array($settings['mapping.'])) {
00213                         return array();
00214                 }
00215                 $mapping = array();
00216                 foreach($settings['mapping.'] as $dbfield=>$formfield) {
00217                         $mapping[$dbfield] = $formfield;
00218                 }
00219                 $this->mapping = $mapping;
00220         }
00221         
00228         protected function initializeController($value='') {
00229                 $this->piVars = t3lib_div::GParrayMerged($this->configuration->getPrefixedPackageKey());
00230         }
00231 
00232 }
